Metadata.title: Scratch Status
Metadata.description: Monitor the real-time status of Scratch services, including uptime, version, server load, and database health. Stay informed with detailed status indicators for Scratch's key services and cache connectivity.

description.part1: Thank you for using this site.
description.part2: We are grateful to have so many users.
description.part3: This site is hosted on Vercel's free plan.
description.part4: Currently, we are nearing the hosting service limits, so access is temporarily restricted.
description.part5: To remove the restriction, one of the following actions is required:
description.list1: Wait for the reset period of Vercel's usage status.
description.part6: However, currently we do not have enough funds to upgrade the plan.
description.part7: Therefore, we have no choice but to impose access restrictions. Thank you for your understanding.
description.support: If you would like to support the operation, you can do so here:

description.part1: Thank you for using our site.
description.part2: Thanks to your support, our site has gained a lot of users, and we are currently undergoing temporary maintenance to improve the service.
description.part3: We are working hard to provide a more stable service after the maintenance.
description.part4: We apologize for the inconvenience, and we appreciate your understanding as we strive to improve our service.
description.support: If you'd like to support the site, you can do so here:
